content: round 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet makes next corner 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 1 fptc around next single_crochet on the left of the next fpdc from round 3 skip next st in previous row 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet ** repeat from * to ** until 3 sts remain 1 single_crochet in last 3 single_crochet for both colorways drop current color & pick up color a slip_stitch to 1st st 48 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 8 fptc round 9 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next half_double_crochet makes 1st corner *1 single_crochet in next 14 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next half_double_crochet makes next corner ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in last 11 sts slip_stitch to 1st st 64 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet round 10 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet over top of half_double_crochet from previous round makes 1st corner *pleasenote the1stscaftereverycornermaybehiddenfromthecornerstitchesyoujustmade makesurenottomissworkingintothatst 1 single_crochet in next 16 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet over top of next half_double_crochet from previous round makes next corner ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in last 13 sts for both colorways drop color a & pick up color b slip_stitch to 1st st 64 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 4 double_crochet note you have the option of cutting the yarn here and completing the tiny square with the sun more prominent this is the pattern titled good morning starshine if you wish to make the full sized square imma keep shinin continue following the rounds below round 11 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet makes 1st corner *1 single_crochet in next 18 sts 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet makes next corner ** repeat from * to ** 2 more times 1 single_crochet in last 15 sts for tri-color colorway only drop color b & pick up color c slip_stitch to 1st st 80 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet please note the special fpdc & the reverse special fpdc sts are in the next round refer back to the special stitches section at the top of the pattern for a reminder on how to perform these round 12 chain 1 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 1 fptc in the fptc to the right of current st from round 8 skip next st 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1hdc over top of half_double_crochet from previous round skip next st fyi this st may be hidden after each corner under the corner sts just made *1 fptc in next fptc from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 1 reverse special fpdc in same fptc just worked and next single_crochet 1 special fpdc using next single_crochet & next fptc from round 8 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts including hidden
